1.content: I suppose the first thing is to get this out of the way. How old should the girl we focus on be.
1.title: The Initial Choice.

choices: Anna, a 9 year old energetic girl, who likes to be naked at home.
Hannah,a 10 year old shy girl who discovers a new lifestyle through a punishment
Jenny, a 12 year old kind girl, who lost her all of her clothes, yet, carries on
11.content:
As a young child, life for these girls is largely simple, because other than going to school and doing their chores, they are free to do whatever they want, be it playing in the park, going on sleepovers, doing sports and more, one always wants be a child again.

Yet, in such a young age, one almost always gets in trouble every now and then, for things such as not doing your homework, disrespecting your elders, and getting naked for example. And in the latter case, it may not be because they like breaking rules, but because they see nudity as something free and innocent.

Such is the case of one of these young girls, who for one reason or other, came to like going nude whatever they went.
11.title: Kid (6-12)

choices: She decided to donate all of her clothes.
Her house caught on fire. Burning all of her clothes.
On the way, she ended up losing the clothes she was wearing.
113.content:
In a small town, there was a girl that all residents knew about. She was called Jenny, if you ask somebody about her, everyone would agree that she was an angel, she had long and blonde hair smooth as silk and green emerald eyes. She was kind and always had a smile on her face. However, she was also remarkable for another reason, all the time, she was naked as the day she was born.

The reason behind this? Well, it all started when she was walking back home ....
113.title: Jenny, a 12 year old kind girl, who lost her al...

choices: Lisa, a 13 year old cheerful girl who gets into an embarrasing accident.
Rebecca, a 16 year old tomboy who is not afraid of getting naked
Alice, a 17 year old model student who joins the art club.
12.content:
As a teenager, these girl will have to face challenges in their life, such as going to middle and high school, dealing with puberty, discovering new sentiments and emotions, making new friends, joining a club, as well as the possibility of getting a boyfriend and more!!.

However, in the midst of all of this, these girls, by the wishes of destiny, or by the machinations of someone, will end up naked and exposed in front of everyone!, yet, not all is lost, for despite this embarrasing moment, they may learn something or two about being in the nude and not being afraid of it.

One of the many examples of the above, is one of these girls who dealt with this situation, and learned to overcome it.
12.title: Teen (13-18)

choices: Luna, a 18 year old high school girl who discovers the wonders of nudism.
Chloe, a 19 year old university student who gets pranked with a new life.
Zoe, a 20 year old part time worker, whose new job requires her to go nude.
13.content:
As a young adult, these girls will have to face new challegences in life, whatever be it finishing highschool and going to the university, getting a parcial or permanent job, and becoming more independent in general.

However, in the midst of all of this, this girl will also have to face the challange of nudity, for one way or the other, she will end up naked and embarrased in public, yet, how does she react to all of this ?, can she get used to it ?, can she become confident about it ?, and how ?

These are questions that will get answered soon, as we look into the life of one of them.
13.title: Young Adult (18-25)

choices: Amelia, a 27 year teacher who recieves a life changing accident.
Sonia, a 28 old recently married woman who goes into an interesting honeymoon
Amanda, a 30 year old business woman with a new daring business plan
14.content:
As a fully adult person now, many women is this age have to deal with many problems and challenges in their life, such a getting married and creating a famlily, having a permanent and stable job, buying a house or a car, and overall being a productive member of society and avoid problems with the law.

However, in the midst of all of this, these women will have to face an aditional challenge as they will come to face humillation and exposure as they get naked in public by forces beyond their control, and that bears the question, how they will reach to such a situation ?, they would be embarrased ?, or they will embrace this newfound freedom from clothes.

Such questions will be answered as we look into the life of one of these women.
14.title: Adult (26+)

choices: Pulling up to Bareside Education Center
Learning what the school was before leaving
141.content:
Amelia had been a teacher for a few years now, and she had decided to apply to a series of specialist schools, don't get her wrong, she loved her current school district, but she needed a little more cash flow. And the specialist schools paid a good deal more than what she was making now, so there really was no question of whether or not to apply for those positions.

Scrolling through the schools, she saw a few names that stood out: 'Beethoven School for the Deaf', 'Van Gogh school for the Blind,' and so on and so on. In the end, the simply decided to hit 'apply all' and see what she got, she'd already listed her preferences, no elementary schools grades, willing to move, etc. now all that she had to do was wait.

And then she got a phone call, from 'Bareside Education Center', they offered her an apartment and everything, but the climcher was the salary. A few interviews and emails and she was set, but little did she know exactly what kind of school this was, what property is was on, and it's mandatory uniform (or lack thereof). Namely, that it was a school in a nudist community.
141.title: Amelia, a 27 year teacher who recieves a life c...

choices: It was empty. Mr. Peters tells her about the mandatory uniform
She sees all the students naked.
1411.content:
Amelia prepared everything on suitcases and cardboard boxes to move to BEC. Her current apartment was rented, which meant that she wouldn't need the help of a moving team. The school's location was given to her by an e-mail, where she would receive an introduction by the principal of the Center.

Driving outside of town, Amelia has high expectations for this job. She arrives to the indicated zone, but she sees a door with a guard in a booth.

"Good evening." Amelia says.

"Good evening." The guard responds. "I apologize for my manners, but could you please tell me the reason why you are here?"

"Of course, I was hired by the Bareside Education Center. And I'm supposed to meet." She grabs her phone. "Um, Mr. Peters."

"I see, you must be the new teacher." The guard seems more relaxed. "Mr. Peters is waiting for you. Let me call him and I'll open the gate for you."

"Okay, thanks." Amelia worries about this place, the possibilities scare her. After a couple of minutes, as the guard opens the door, a man with an elegant suit walks towards her car, he looked like he could be in his 30's.

"Hello, Amelia." The man greets her. "Let me introduce myself, my name is Nathan Peters. I'm the principal of the BEC. It's a pleasure." He extends his hand.

She shakes his hand. "The pleasure is mine. Say, why do you use this door?" She was worried that she accepted a teaching job in a cult or something similar.

"Years ago, our community used to live closer, but due to some complaints we had to build this door to respect the rest of the residents of the zone." Mr. Peters responds. "Do you mind if I join you on your way to the school? I had a long walk."

She nodded and opened the copilot door. They arrive to the school and
1411.title: Pulling up to Bareside Education Center

choices: The next day, nervously peeking through the blinds
The next day, uncomfortable grocery shopping
14111.content:
Pulling up to the school, she saw that it was pretty standard and modern as far as aesthetics go, lots of big windows and a good sized soccer field and playground. "It's a nice looking school." Amelia said looking over at Mr. Peters, "When do the classes open again?"

Mr. Peters looked over st her, "Four days." He led her to the door, "Plenty of time to get settled in here at Bareside."

Looking around at the empty halls, she could just feel like this was the right job! He led her down the halls, showing her the cafeteria, library, gym, and where her classroom will be. It was all pretty standard, she thought, as she looked at her soon-to-be classroom, so why the gated community?

"Forgive me for asking," she said a littlest nervously, really hoping that she didn't just accidentally join a cult, "but why the gated community?"

Mr. Peters looked at her strangely, "Uh, you do realize we're a nudist community, right?" He chuckled, "It's even in the name: Bareside."

Amelia paled, looking very much like a gasping fish before her face turned red from the thought of seeing everyone, her coworkers, her students, her neighbors naked. "Will I have to..." her question died off as he nodded slowly.

"We didn't see anyone since it's a bit late and we weren't near main street," he said as he shrugged, "but if you drive around for a bit, you'll see what I'm talking about."

Amelia started hyperventilating, "I- I can't do this!" She shook her head, "I just can't!"

Mr. Peters grunted, "You'll have to. You're under contract. And please don't forget, that this is a nudist community, not a clothing optional. Even around town, it's mandatory to be nude." He quickly added, "Hats, fanny bags/purses, and shoes are allowed though."

Amelia finished her tour in a daze, driving to her new apartment, which turned out to be a small townhouse, she just kept looking straight, blocking out her surroundings as she went inside and collapsed on the unmade bed, still in her clothes.

A teenager. (A possible student of hers.)
141111.content:
Amelia walks through a hall, feeling that something was off. She walks inside a classroom and sees all her students whispering something and giving her disgusted looks.

"Okay, class. Open your books on page 20." She instructs, however, her desk was empty.

"Ms. Amelia." A student raises a hand. "Are you sure you didn't forget something."

Amelia looks at herself, she was standing naked in front of her students. She opens her eyes, it was all a dream. She gets up from her bed and brushes her teeth.

Last night, the teacher sneaked out of her new house to pick stuff from her car, she didn't want to see or meet anyone naked. With her head full of worries, she goes to the living room and sees a letter down her door.

"Dear, new citizen. We welcome you to Bareside, a community with people that are compromised with nudism in their daily lives. We hope that you will enjoy your stay."

Amelia sighed, it was a nice detail, but she wasn't convinced to leave her home without clothes. She peeks through the blinds, seeing an old man mowing his lawn in the house at the other side of the street and a couple of kids playing with a ball. A common sight if it wasn't for the fact that she was able to see their butts.

She blushes and gets away from the window. She knew it was a matter of time before.....

She hears someone knocking on her door, but who was it?
141111.title: The next day, nervously peeking through the blinds

The woman knocked again, this time ringing her doorbell, and Amelia slowly walked toward the door, and reached for the doorknob as if it'd kill her. Opening it, she saw a naked black lady smiling and holding a plate of cookies.

"Welcome to Bareside!" The woman cheered, before frowning, "You know that those ain't gonna fly here, right hon?" She gestured to Amelia's outfit.

Amelia sighed and nodded, "I just found out yesterday." She looked away from her neighbor out of being uncomfortable, "I didn't know this place was a nudist community until I did the tour of the school!"

The woman looked at her a bit oddly, "Dud you just look up the school, and not the gated community it was in?" She walked over and patted Amelia on the back, "Don't worry, it'll be fine, just strip down and tame your first steps." She smiled when Amelia looked up at her, "My names Debrah."

Amelia rubbed her eyes, "I'm Amelia."

"Now then," Debrah said as she stepped in and closed the door, "Lets get you moved in and out of those clothes!"

Amelia blushed, but followed her neighbor down the hall.

"I see. And what are the rules of this place?" Amelia asks.

"No clothes, obviously." Debra opens the box with Amelia's clothes. "Which means you don't need to unpack these." She moves the box. "And just be yourself. Pretty much standard rules."

"And do people have..." Amelia stops for a second. "Outside?"

"Damn, girl." Debra blushes. "Of course not, there are children here. You are really naive about nudism, how about we go outside and show you around?"

Amelia sees a woman, most likely in her middle 30's, she had short hair with green hair dye. The teacher saw that she only had one breast.

"Hi, I'm Amelia. I'm your new neighbor."

"First time in nudism overall." Amelia blushes a little. "I was practicing a little."

"Thanks." Amelia looks at Carol's chest, but she notices it. "I'm sorry, I was.."

Amelia felt embarrassed for being too obvious. "How long has been since you went to surgery?"

"Six months ago. But it was worth it, now I can see my kids grow." Carol feels confident about her future.

"You have kids?" Amelia feels.

"Yeah, two girls." Carol responds. "How about you?"

"No, I don't." Amelia says. "I mean, I've been thinking about it. But I think I'll continue with my job as a teacher."

1411111221122.content:
"I don't know," Amelia said, rubbing her arm in an attempt to calm nerves, "if I feel up to it, I'll join you in an hour. But I just need to get used to, this." She gestured to their bodies.

Carol nodded, "The offer stands." A *ding* was heard coming from the house, "Oh, those would be the cookies. Come on, I'll let you have some, a little welcome to the neighborhood present."

Amelia tried to think of a reason to say no, but couldn't and decided to hop the fence and come over anyway, following Carol up the porch into the house. Amelia looked around as Carol putted around the kitchen, slipping on some oven mitts and pulling out a tray of cookies, wafting them with a paper plate to cool them. Looking at the pictures on the wall, she saw the usual pictures, family, the kids, school, a thin man who was undoubtedly Carol's husband, but something looked off about him, specifically his chest.

"See something you like dear?" Carol asked as she walked over, "Ah, I remember that, that was when we moved in, didn't know I was pregnant then yet. Found out a week or so later."

Amelia pointed at the husbands chest, "Is that a trick of the light? Or it is something ... else?"

Carol laughed it off, "That'd be his chest. Poor James was always so awkward about it, but he credits the lifestyle with him accepting it." She looked over at the clock, "He's still out seeing some old friends who live across town, but he's a teacher too, history in fact."

Amelia's eyebrows went up, 'What're the odds my new neighbor was a coworker?'

"Oh, my little Sally, she is playing with a friend of hers outside. She is younger than Lauren." Amelia thinks if she was the girl she saw earlier.

"So, why did you choose Bareside?" She serves two cups of coffee and hands one to Amelia.

Amelia begins to understand how nudity wasn't awkward or weird.

choices: She has a minor freak out while shopping
141111122112211.content:
"Are you going shopping with me Amelia?" Carol asked as she grabbed her purse, heading to the front door.

Amelia thought about it, she needed to get used to this eventually, and Carol seemed nice enough to let her go st her own pace, "Yes, just let me run back over and grab my purse." She said, heading out back and hopping the fence again since her front door was still locked. Grabbing her purse, she headed to her front door and froze, was she really going to do this? Go outside in front of the whole neighborhood and the community completely naked?

Yes, she decided as she exited her house as quickly as possible, locking the door behind her.

"Ready to go?" Carol called from her minivan at the curb, having backed out and in front of Amelia's house.

"Yes." Amelia said as she quickly got to the van, "Before I change my mind."

Nodding, Carol put the van in drive and headed down the street, Amelia took the time to look around a thing the sights, the kids playing in the front yard, the teenagers walking down the street, the families out on bike rides, everything was as normal as could be. Except that everyone was naked.

Downtown wasn't any different, she saw hipsters, regular people, old people, even police (!) going about their day completely naked! Well, except for the cops, who were wearing their hats and belts, but they had to stand out somehow.

Pulling up to the grocery store, Amelia took deep breaths as she opened the door and took her first steps in the wider public as naked as everyone else.
141111122112211.title: Shopping with Carol.

1411111221122112.content:
In the grocery shop, Amelia and Carol walk together.

"Okay. Let me see here." Carol takes her phone out of her purse to see the list she prepared. Amelia, in the other hand, grabs supplies to finish this quickly.

"Amelia, I hope you don't mind, but can you help me?" Carol asks her.

"Sure." She nervously responds.

"I need to check an offer in fruits, could you please bring me a cereal box from that aisle." She points towards a corner in the store. "It's the white one with blue logos."

"Uh, sure." Amelia rubs her arm and walks into the aisle. She thought that maybe she was exaggerating. Seeing the empty shelves, she looks at one last box, in the lower part. Amelia bends over and grabs it, not before hearing someone saying. "Nice!" She quickly ran back to Carol.

Carol sees the teacher covering herself and completely blushed, dropping the cereal into the shopping cart. "Are you okay?"

"No, I'm not. I think I'm done for today." She heavily breathes.

"Relax, inhale and exhale." Carol tries to calm her, after a few seconds, she asks her about what happened and Amelia explains. "Really? Then follow me." Both walk back to the aisle and they see a couple looking at carpets. "Yeah, maybe this one." The woman says. "Come on, honey, look at this one, it's really nice." The man replies. Turns out it was just her imagination.

"See, no one was talking about you."

Amelia sighs. "Sorry, I'm still nervous about this whole thing."

"Then, don't think about it." Carol touches her shoulder. "Just relax. You need to be more confident with yourself. And you know what? I have the perfect place in mind."
1411111221122112.title: She has a minor freak out while shopping

After a tense ride back home, Amelia found herself being dragged out of her home by Carol to a local spa, the building was only one story tall, but seemed to be a pretty decent one in terms of accommodations. Hurriedly walking into the lobby, she was greeted by the secretary, a bald, busty woman with a bush even larger than Amelia's.

"Hey Carol! Brought in someone new eh?" The woman asked.

"Yeah," Carol said grabbing Amelia's shoulder, "it's her first day being nudie, and she needs to relax. Especially since she's the new teacher at the school." She looked at Amelia, "Amelia, this is Sara. Sara, Amelia."

14111112211221122.title: A spa.

141111122112211221.content:
"We'll start with the sauna room." Carol says.

"Perfect, there you go." Sara gives them a pair of towels. "And enjoy your stay in here, Amelia."

"Thanks." She responds. They about to enter the spa.

"Oh, before I forgot, we are giving free massages today, in case you want one later." Sara tells them. The two nodded and step inside.

Amelia sees everything that this spa could offer, massages, acupuncture, manicure, pedicure, even Jacuzzi.

"Here we are." Carol says, looking at the sauna room. "Come on, it's time to do it."

In minutes, Amelia starts to notice the effects of the room. Meanwhile, Carol was used to this. "So, how do you feel?" She asks the teacher.

"Better, actually." Amelia replies. "I'm sorry for how I acted at the grocery store."

"Don't think about it." Carol closes her eyes. "I didn't bring you here to worry about that."

"So, why did you help me? I don't want to be rude, but I was wondering about it."

"A lot of things, first, you seem to be a good person, second, you remind me of my husband when he started teaching. He was too nervous to give the class to his students. And it's hard to admit it, but I was looking forward to be your friend, I hope that doesn't bother you."

Amelia smiles. "Not at all." She stretches her arms. "I guess it's time to get out of this room, you want to get a massage?"

Carol nods and both get out of the sauna.
141111122112211221.title: Sauna room

choices: Waking up and forgetting that she's naked
1411111221122112212.content:
Amelia was laying out on her bed, feeling totally relaxed from the spa, the sauna worked wondered at coolingher off, and that masseuse, Serge, his accent may have been the thickest she'd ever heard, but he was the best masseuse she'd ever had! Rolling over in her bed, she looked at her clock and saw that it was already 6:30! She'd spent the whole afternoon naked!

"I can't believe I did that." She muttered to herself, getting up and stretching, she headed down to her living room to watch a bit of tv, see if anything was on. But once she'd turned it on, she didn't recognize any of the channels! Scrolling through, she didn't even recognize some of the shows! "What on earth?" She said as she tune down into one station and saw that the newscast was naked! Each channel had everyone completely naked! The soap operas, the kids channels, all the news, the few movies too!

Looking at this, she realized that she ,us the bed using the communities private network, she didn't see a satellite on her roof, she it was most likely a cable service. But after getting over the shock, she had to admit, it was kind of surreal watching soap operas and the news with everyone naked!

Eventually it grew to be late enough that Amelia headed upstairs to go to bed, she still had things to do, and a new lifestyle to get used to.

choices: Julie calls Amelia. (She is lost and doesn't know where is Bareside)

153221.content:
On a freeway, Marge and Lisa Simpson were on their way to check out a new place.

"Lisa, it was nice of you to win those tickets for your father and Bart to go to the Atoms baseball game, while we spend the day bonding." Marge says while she drives.

"It was nothing, I knew dad would like them." The 8 year old replies, truth was that she wanted to visit a new place outside of town and she didn't need to have the boys around.

At the distance, Lisa sees a rural road next to the highway.

"That's the place, take this road!" Lisa instructs her mother.

In seconds, the car starts to shake, feeling each rock, pebble and possible animal.

"So, we are going to an Amish village or?" Marge starts to wonder.

"Actually, this is a different type of village." Lisa nervously responds.

Marge finds a empty slot in the parking lot and both get out of the car, they walk and they stopped by some lockers at the the end of the parking lot.

"Welcome to Natureland." A naked man appears in front of them.

Marge tries to avoid looking at him and quickly blocks Lisa's eyes. "Follow the sound of my voice and forget what you saw."

"Mom, he is part of the staff." Lisa takes off her mother's hand, she gets a brochure from the man. "These are lockers for your clothes." The man leaves, looking for anybody else that just arrived.

"Oh my!" Marge exclaims. "This is a nudist colony. Lisa, you better have an explanation for this." But she sees Lisa undressing and putting her orange dress along with a white pair of panties inside a locker.

"Sorry for not telling you, but I really want to spend some time here, they don't eat meat and every food here is organic." Lisa explains. "Please, mom?" She begs.

Marge curls her mouth and says.....
153221.title: Yes

155312.content: Where do first find Emma?
155312.title: Emma

1553121.content:
Currently, at home alone in her New York City penthouse, Emma Ross is laying on her bed in her bedroom wearing a pair of bedazzled blue jeans, a silk t-shirt, and barefoot.

Having just finished texting her friend Rosie, Emma decides that she would like to take a relaxing and luxurious bath so feeling grateful that she won't have to worry about being interrupted by either her brothers Luke and or Ravi, her sister Zuri or butler Bertram
due to the rest of her family and Bertram being on vacation, Emma stands up, and
quickly pushes her bedazzled jeans down her legs, and over her bare feet, before stepping out of them altogether, and tossing them into her nearby hamper leaving herself wearing just her fancy silk shirt and surprisingly a pair of boxers.

Granted, they're expensive designer boxers but to anyone who knows Emma well, it would be quite surprising to discover that she prefers to wear boxers more often than panties.

Heck, Emma can't help but grin upon having that thought as she imagines most people who know her assume that she wears lacy panties or even thongs though she does hope that people aren't thinking of her in her underwear or naked all too often.

Not wanting to waste any more time Emma grabs the bottom of her silk t-shirt with both hands, pulls it up her torso, over her head and tosses it into the hamper with her previously discarded jeans which leaves her standing in the middle of her bedroom wearing just her boxers due to the fact that she had not been wearing a bra as she did not see the point since she was going to have the penthouse to herself for the next few weeks.

Wearing nothing but her boxers now, Emma pauses to admire herself in her full-length wall mounted mirror and can't help but smile and say out loud :

I am really looking good. Although I could use a good tan.

Moments later, after admiring herself for a few more seconds Emma grabs the waistband of her boxers, pushes them down her legs, over her bare feet, steps out of them altogether and tosses them into the hamper with her previously discarded shirt and pants which leaves her standing in the middle of her bedroom completely naked and barefoot.

Deciding that she should go ahead and empty her hamper down the laundry chute Emma walks over to her hamper, picks it up, and carries it a few feet over to the laundry chute leading to the downstairs laundry room and empties the entire hamper down the chute.

Having taken care of that, Emma puts the hamper back in the nearby corner and heads into her bathroom to begin her relaxing and luxurious bath.
1553121.title: Home Alone

info.brief_description: This website has plenty of ENF, so why not?
info.description:
Greetings and all that, potential writers.
Inspired by a couple stories from CHYOA, this story will take the E out of ENF and replace it with a C. For confidence.

Basically, it’s the same as an ENF story in which a girl loses her clothes in a public place. However, instead of being embarrassed, the girl decides to roll with it and “own” her nudity.

Of course, how confident these girls actually are is up to you. Are they truly unashamed about being seen in the buff, or just faking it to save face?

Sound like fun yet?

Rules:
I shan’t allow underage sex, and I definitely shan’t allow rape or non-con.
Other than that, just try to keep things on topic.
